menu.name: Gobi Manchurian
menu.description: Crispy cauliflower florets tossed in a spicy Indo-Chinese manchurian sauce.

menu.name: Chicken Dum Biryani
menu.description: Fragrant long-grain basmati rice cooked with succulent chicken and secret spices.

menu.name: Paneer Tikka
menu.description: Cottage cheese cubes marinated in yogurt and spices, grilled in a tandoor.

menu.name: King Fish Thali
menu.description: Authentic coastal thali featuring rava fried King Fish, curry, rice, and solkadhi.

menu.name: Butter Chicken
menu.description: Tender chicken pieces simmered in a rich, creamy tomato-based gravy.

menu.name: Mushroom Gravy
menu.description: Fresh button mushrooms cooked in a thick, spiced onion-tomato gravy.
